C

capture() - Method in class robot.FlagCapturer
Method to manipulate arm to grab the block that is the flag
captureFlag() - Static method in class robot.Robot
This method uses the robot's arm to capture the flag
Communications - Class in robot
This class will contain all the methods to deal with everything necessary with regards to communication between the block and an outside computer, using Wifi.
Communications() - Constructor for class robot.Communications
 
convertCoordinates(Point2D[]) - Method in class robot.Localizer
This method takes the coordinates of the landmarks of the field (enemy base, home base, and starting coordinates) and converts it so that the robot's coordinates are 0,0 and the other landmark coordinates are relative to that.
